name: NSLevelIndicatorCell
desc: NSLevelIndicatorCell is a subclass of NSActionCell that provides several level indicator display styles including: capacity, ranking and relevancy. The capacity style provides both continuous and discrete modes.

items.name: init(levelIndicatorStyle: NSLevelIndicator.Style)
items.desc: Initializes the receiver with the style specified by levelIndicatorStyle.

items.name: var minValue: Double
items.desc: The minimum value of the control.

items.name: var maxValue: Double
items.desc: The maximum value of the control.

items.name: var levelIndicatorStyle: NSLevelIndicator.Style
items.desc: The style of the level indicator control.

items.name: var warningValue: Double
items.desc: The warning value of the level indicator control.

items.name: var criticalValue: Double
items.desc: The critical value of the level indicator control.

items.name: var tickMarkPosition: NSSlider.TickMarkPosition
items.desc: The placement of tick marks on the level indicator control.

items.name: var numberOfTickMarks: Int
items.desc: The number of tick marks displayed by the control.

items.name: var numberOfMajorTickMarks: Int
items.desc: The number of major tick marks displayed by the control.

items.name: func tickMarkValue(at: Int) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the receiverâ€™s value represented by the tick mark at index (the minimum-value tick mark has an index of 0).

items.name: func rectOfTickMark(at: Int) -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the bounding rectangle of the tick mark identified by index (the minimum-value tick mark is at index 0).

items.name: enum NSLevelIndicator.Style
items.desc: Constants that specify a level indicator's appearance.
